backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of many frontend components and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and color variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page wiring the root element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/assets/popupMemeImages.ts: Exports list of locally served popup meme image paths.
frontend/src/components/CharacterBadge.t: Fixed-position character illustration with an overlaid decorative badge.
frontend/src/components/departments/Depa: Shared container for department sections with morphing borders, decorative patterns, and dynamic typography. Uses scroll state to vary clip‑paths and title styling.
frontend/src/components/departments/Inst: Aggregates a large set of procrastination‑themed department sections and micro‑modules into a single rendered sequence. Provides the main departmental content block.
frontend/src/components/departments/sect: Displays a grid of humorous procrastination-themed badges inside a department shell.
Renders a simple help section telling the user to close the site.
Provides a random prophecy generator with preset humorous predictions and a few static prophecy cards.
Shows a timeline of procrastination events and a humorous failure status message.
Displays spoof analytics like peak avoidance hours, snack ratio, and excuse diversity with dynamic values.
Interactive sliders let users adjust variables to compute a comedic 'delay constant'.
Lists minor procrastination tasks with an admire toggle and tracks total admired items.
Interactive trial simulation component that advances through staged content and displays witness testimonies at stage 1.
Button-triggered ascension counter with dimming effect, confetti events, and an achievement on first use.
Static component displaying a single unchanging message encouraging users to return tomorrow.
Form for submitting a task postponement request that briefly shows an approval message on submission.
Multi-step confirmation flow that cycles through prompts before ending in a resettable 'nothing happens' screen.
Mock donation interface letting users 'donate minutes,' with confirmation feedback and a running total displayed.
Simulated focus mode that interrupts users after a delay and redirects them when they choose distraction.
A humorous Wi‑Fi themed section with a mock speed test and sacred‑style text blocks.
Displays a list of ‘miracles’ and tracks user reactions by incrementing counts.
Shows static fake caffeine analytics and a mock chart comparing caffeine to productivity.
Lists saved articles with categories and exaggerated unread status messaging.
Implements a step‑based ritual progress UI with completion tracking and reset.
Shows multiple ‘universes’ of productivity and selects one to reveal the user’s reality.
Displays unfinished projects with hover‑revealed emotional last‑access info.
Renders an about section with themed text blocks describing mission, team, research, and accreditation inside a DepartmentSectionShell.
Displays a button that reveals a random prophecy message, wrapped in a DepartmentSectionShell.
Generates a random humorous excuse with an animated approval stamp using state and delays.
Implements a self-resetting 25‑minute timer that triggers a message at 12 seconds before resetting.
Shows a static, styled leaderboard highlighting humorous productivity rankings.
Provides a multi-question quiz with radio options and a predetermined result display.
Accepts a deadline and displays a playful quantum‑themed excuse once submitted.
Renders a humorous sacred-themed section about procrastination cycles with stylized text and decorative panels.
Displays an interactive vault interface where attempts to access always result in a comedic access-denied message.
Shows a list of focus tips inside an accordion UI with playful, procrastination-themed content.
Provides expandable lists of comedic digital commandments and parable segments within a sacred-styled layout.
Offers selectable humorous self-help courses and a mock graduation form that reveals a diploma when completed.
A simple interactive section that increments and displays snack blessings when a button is clicked.
Renders multiple themed meme sections featuring humorous captions and images across sacred, infernal, and pop-culture styles.
Shows a step-based meditation sequence that humorously ends with opening another tab.
A playful section displaying a growing counter of imaginary 'emotional tabs' with a button to increment it.
Renders a scrollable list of humorous procrastination-themed terms and conditions.
Provides a countdown feature and calculates the next 'optimal' rounded start time with interactive UI elements.
Shows a stylized visualization of how deadlines drift forward in time with no return path.
Displays a courtroom-style scene where excuses lead to every deadline being officially postponed.
frontend/src/components/departments/Unne: Renders a collection of appendix‑style humorous department sections. Groups various themed subsections into one container.
frontend/src/components/FramedMedia.tsx: Ornate framed scroll component that progressively reveals humorous commandments.
frontend/src/components/HeadlineBlock.ts: Displays main temple headline, subtitle, and intro text.
frontend/src/components/InfiniteRepeatBl: Repeats wrapped content infinitely using a sentinel and scroll detection.
frontend/src/components/intro/CurtainInt: Full‑screen animated curtain overlay that locks scroll, animates open on click, and unmounts after reveal.
frontend/src/components/media/Unnecessar: Section showcasing humorous ASMR and audio clips themed around procrastination and productivity.
Renders a themed section containing humorous video content blocks with styled containers and captions.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ac: Implements a slide-out panel showing a list of achievements with unlock status and a trigger button.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/AI: Provides a form where users submit a confession and receive a canned response inside a styled section.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ap: Displays a full-screen loading overlay with animated elements and a customizable apology message.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Co: Generates and animates a burst of confetti particles from a given coordinate, auto-clearing after 2 seconds.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Cu: Occasionally shows transient sigh text at random screen positions, fading out after a delay.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Di: Exposes a function to emit an audio microfeature event for a 'choir' sound effect.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Fa: Shows a modal with a humorous CAPTCHA selection grid and always fails verification on submit.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ha: Renders a rotating halo graphic that follows the user's cursor position.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Je: Triggers a brief Jesus-themed overlay flash on scroll, dismissible on click or tap.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Mi: Listens for microfeature events to trigger UI effects like confetti, toasts, achievements, audio, captcha, and loading overlays, and renders persistent microfeature components.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ra: Periodically spawns and auto-removes floating meme images at random positions and sizes across the screen.
Shows rapid, bright golden flash overlays while the user is scrolling, with randomized timing and duration.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Sc: Displays a full-screen figure with randomized humorous 'lessons' during scroll-triggered revelation events, with fade and animation effects.
frontend/src/components/MicroHumor.tsx: Shows corner note, fake loading bar with timed result, and humorous disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Bur: Renders a multi-step humorous bureaucratic form that progresses through text inputs and a questionnaire before ending with a 'system busy' message.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Con: Plays through a short scripted chat sequence between the user and a bot, advancing one line at a time.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Dep: Lets users record micro-avoidance actions, tracking counts per item and displaying static XP humor.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Emo: Shows a list of emotional 'stocks' whose values update periodically based on their trend.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Exi: Displays a single dramatic existential quote inside a styled module shell.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Fin: Renders a tabbed interface with humorous placeholder content including long text, glossary, myth pages, a calendar, and a contact action.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Gen: Simulates a DNA analysis with an auto-increasing progress bar and reveals a comedic result when complete.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Hal: Displays a grid of humorous minor achievements, each styled like a celebratory award.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Hol: Shows a randomly positioned tooltip at intervals that opens a dialog with random trivia when clicked.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Jes: Lists themed humorous episode titles styled within a decorative module shell.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mat: Provides inputs for a playful time-calculation joke and reveals a humorous 'Yes' answer when triggered.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mic: A decorative layout wrapper that adds ornate styling, a title, and optional emoji around module content.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mir: Lets users toggle ‘miracle’ checkboxes and displays a fixed humorous miracle probability.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mus: Shows a list of fictional merchandise items with prices and cart buttons plus a delayed-purchase button.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Nat: Displays a mock vote on starting a task with progress bars showing heavily skewed results.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Not: Triggers random toast notifications when activated, simulating distracting device alerts.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Off: Renders a module that shows a button to generate a mock ID card and displays a stylized card with random ID once clicked.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Pre: Displays a premium membership module listing benefits and an upgrade button in a styled container.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Pro: Implements a hover-triggered card that reveals a humorous chant inside a styled micromodule shell.
Shows a faux documentary section with dramatic title, mock video area, and narration text.
Presents a grid of humorous productivity-themed yoga poses inside a styled micromodule.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Sac: Displays a mock refrigerator livestream panel with a message implying nothing has changed.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Sta: Renders a portal emphasizing that plans start next Monday, optionally noting if today is Monday.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingPrompt: Interactive confession selector with buttons that reveal a temporary alert message. Manages chosen confession and shows a playful confirmation on submit.
frontend/src/components/OrnateMorphingSe: Wrapper that applies a scroll‑driven morphing clip‑path border and decorative elements around child content. Uses a custom hook to switch shapes and preserve interaction inside.
frontend/src/components/TempleLayout.tsx: Main page layout assembling navigation, onboarding, departments, media sections, and multiple microfeatures. Integrates scroll‑triggered effects and dual background audio.
frontend/src/components/TopNavBar.tsx: Top navigation bar that lists sections and smooth‑scrolls to targets when clicked. Renders a styled background and responsive button list.
frontend/src/hooks/useAchievements.ts: Manages achievement state with localStorage persistence and provides functions to unlock or reset achievements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and reacts to identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoplayFallbackBa: Autoplays looping background audio with fallback listeners for user interaction when autoplay is blocked.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurtainIntroFlag.t: Tracks whether an intro curtain has been dismissed using sessionStorage and provides a dismiss handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useDualAutoplayFallba: Attempts to autoplay two layered audio tracks with fallback interaction listeners and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinitePageRepeat: Provides logic for appending repeated page blocks using an intersection observer, capped to three blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and login state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrofeatureEvents: Implements a global pub/sub system for emitting and subscribing to small UI events like confetti, toasts, and audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollActivity.ts: Tracks whether the user is actively scrolling and returns a boolean that becomes false after inactivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollOrnateBorder: Maps scroll position to a 0–1 phase value and dynamically selects a geometric border shape based on scroll percentage.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollTriggeredRev: Triggers cameo figure overlays at specific scroll thresholds and manages reveal/fade-out state with dismissal handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive custom color variables plus styles for a full-screen animated curtain overlay.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current requirements, architectural constraints, known issues, and pending fixes for the ornate single-page app.
